snippet.title: Mont Ventoux \- Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet.description:
* Mont Ventoux \- Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mont_Ventoux Cached
* History| * Flora and fauna| * Road cycling| * Skiing
Mont Ventoux (Ventor in Provençal) is a mountain in the Provence region of southern France, located some 20 km northeast of Carpentras, Vaucluse.
